info.name: Erkan Basar
info.about: I am a computer scientist specializing in AI and machine learning, with a focus on language technologies. My work is aimed at advancing research in AI and its practical applications. I enjoy working in multidisciplinary environments, collaborating with experts across various domains to bring innovative and effective solutions to complex challenges.

experience.name: Radboud University
highlights: Multidisciplinary research on controlled usage of large language models for utterance generation and dialogue management in health-promoting conversational agents

experience.name: FloodTags
highlights: Provided strategic guidance and technical expertise in AI solutions, assisting the company in developing and optimizing text processing workflows, and leveraging the advancements in AI to extract information from unstructured text.

experience.name: FloodTags
highlights: Specialized in the development of machine learning-based systems for event detection and information extraction, with a focus on analysing news articles related to natural disasters.

Utilizing state-of-the-art AI techniques and tools of the time, I have created an end-to-end information processing pipeline that has been successfully applied and tested in multiple languages, including English, French, Burmese, Lao, and Khmer.

experience.name: Radboud University
highlights: Developed a system that converts Dutch dialect words into their dictionary forms.
The project also included a demo website where users can interact with the system.

experience.name: FloodTags
highlights: Developed a machine learning-based information extraction system to detect critical information about disasters in news articles.
Started a data visualization website which displays the processed data in real time.

awards.title: Radboud Scholarship Programme
awards.summary: The Radboud Scholarship Programme offers a select number of talented prospective non-EEA students the opportunity to receive a scholarship to pursue a complete English-taught Master's degree programme at Radboud University. The Radboud Scholarship Programme is very selective and is only intended for talented students who have obtained outstanding study results and are highly motivated to pursue a Master's degree programme at Radboud University.
